title: [娱乐|聊天]ChatFeelings —— 向你心仪的女生表达爱意[1.8-1.9]
author: xusg
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:10 编辑 

ChatFeelings》》聊天表情插件《《在因为MC中无法表达自己的心情而憋屈吗?游戏中遇到心仪的女生不能表达自己的爱意吗?那么你走对地方了！

· What does this plugin do?Ever wanted to show your emotions? Now you can with ChatFeelings you can hug, slap, poke, or high-five someone in minecraft! With more being added everyday please let us know what you think about it... All the love and or hate can be shown with commands in chat! If you cant find your squishy way of showing love to someone or your rock hard way of hating someone please let us know in the comments below!!
· 这个插件能做什么？想表达你的心情感受？ 用这个插件你可以拥抱, 打耳巴子, 戳人, 或者击掌! 随着每天更多生物的加入请让我们知道大家是如何想的(????)... 你的所有爱恨情仇都可以通过命令在聊天中表达! 如果你不能找到一个娇羞的方法来表达爱意或者一种暴力的方法来表达恨，就使用我们的插件吧！(这句话乱翻译的，不是很明白作者想表达什么)

————————————————————————————————————————————————————
分割线————————————————————————————————————————————————————
· 功能命令范围- 玩家只能在范围内才能扇别人耳巴子.冷却时间- 玩家一段时间以内只能亲别人一次.更新显示- 作者将会知道插件装在了你的服务端上. (可怕)自动更新- 插件将会自动更新.

· 命令/hug (player) - 拥抱某人/slap (player)  - 扇某人耳巴子/poke (player)  - 戳某人/highfive (player) - 和某人击掌/yell (player) - 向某人喊叫/facepalm (player) - 捂住某人的脸(???还是捂住自己脸)/bite (player) - 咬某人(...)/snuggle (player) - 蹭某人/shake (player) - 摇某人/stab (player) - 刺某人/kiss (player) - 亲吻某人(?)/punch(player) - 一拳打在某人身上/murder (player) - 谋杀某人(不是真谋杀)/cf help/cf reload/cf version

· 图片


· 权限/hug (player)  Permission: chatfeelings.hug /slap (player) Permission: chatfeelings.slap /poke (player) Permission: chatfeelings.poke /highfive (player) Permission: chatfeelings.highfive /yell (player) Permission: chatfeelings.yell /bite (player) Permission: chatfeelings.bite /shake (player) Permission: chatfeelings.shake /snuggle (player) Permission: chatfeelings.snuggle /facepalm (player) Permission: chatfeelings.facepalm /stab (player) Permission: chatfeelings.stab /kiss (player) Permission: chatfeelings.kiss /punch(player) Permission: chatfeelings.punch /murder (player) Permission: chatfeelings.murder /cf help Permission: chatfeelings.chatfeelings /cf reload Permission: chatfeelings.admin.reload /cf version Permission: chatfeelings.admin.version 


配置文件Auto-Update: falseDeveloper-Join: trueCommand-Radius: 100Commands-Delay-Seconds: 5

Auto-Update: 设置插件是否自动更新
Developer-Join: 在进入游戏时，是否显示版本信息
Command-Radius: 设置命令范围(方块数)
Commands-Delay-Seconds: 设置冷却时间(秒) 如果要关闭此功能就填写 'none'

已知BUG有些时候设置了范围后，当命令目标在范围之外会显示 "An internal error has occurred".

下载:
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bpFkOft 密码 8hac
由于没有汉化文本文件...作者直接写在源码里了，源码包太乱，加上我是java新手一个，所以无法汉化了..
谢谢支持
